vision: Juan aspires to be a leading expert in embedded systems design principles with a specialization in SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture.

mentoring_goals.name: Embedded Systems Design Principles
mentoring_goals.objective: Gain a comprehensive understanding of best embedded systems design principles.

activities.name: Attend a workshop on advanced embedded systems design.
activities.performance_metrics: Demonstrate understanding of advanced embedded systems design principles.

activities.name: Review and analyze three recent embedded system projects to understand design choices and challenges.
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully analyze and present insights from the reviewed projects.

mentoring_goals.name: SatNav/GNSS SDR Architecture
mentoring_goals.objective: Acquire in-depth knowledge of SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture.

activities.name: Attend a seminar or webinar on SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture.
activities.performance_metrics: Demonstrate understanding of SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture concepts.

activities.name: Work on a hands-on project to design a basic SatNav/GNSS SDR system.
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully design and implement a basic SatNav/GNSS SDR system.
